title: Super Mario Bros. game manual font
content:
hey guys, i tried whatthefont and it didn’t work. does anyone know what font this is? i want to design an information design piece around nintendo using the manual as a reference. here is a shot of the cover and one of the pages. thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081206132807im_/http:/typophile.com/files/cover_6407.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081206132807im_/http:/typophile.com/files/page2_5234.jpg)

 [‹ Help Identify please](http://web.archive.org/web/20081206132807/http:/typophile.com/node/51232 "Go to previous forum topic") [Easy-ish ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081206132807/http:/typophile.com/node/51237 "Go to next forum topic")
author: miss50sretro

comments.content:
SUPER MARO BROS is Helvetica.INSTRUCTION BOOKLET is Arial.  
The text is Arial, too.
I’d rather say [Univers](http://web.archive.org/web/20081206132807/http:/www.linotype.com/1560/univers-family.html) for the lower image ...

Yeah, definitely Univers for the small text (see ’G’, ’K’, ’t’, etc.)

- Lex
yeah, i think it’s univers, the R’s tail curves slightly, the t...cool guys, thanks!!!
